title: Woman Judge

nouns: A woman is a female human.
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.
An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.
An adult female person (as opposed to a man)
Judges are officials who presides over a court of law, either alone or as part of a panel, and make determinations about the applicability of the law to the facts presented.
A judge presides over court proceedings, either alone or as a part of a panel of judges.
The title of a justice of court.
A public official authorized to decide questions brought before a court of justice
A person who decides the fate of someone or something that has been called into question.
Official who presides over court proceedings
An official who presides over a court

description: A woman who presides over court proceedings, wearing the traditional black gown and wielding a gavel.
apple_vendor_description: The woman judge emoji on Apple devices embodies authority and fairness with a distinguished presence. She is depicted wearing a traditional robe, rendered with Apple‚Äôs characteristic glossy 3D shading that gives the fabric depth and texture, while realistic lighting highlights the stern yet impartial expression on her face. This emoji, with its smooth gradients and soft rounded edges, is commonly used to represent legal proceedings, justice, or the concept of judgment.
